Package game

Interface ComputeDistance

All Known Implementing Classes:
FollowBehaviour, ShootAction
public interface ComputeDistance
Provides logic to compute layer distance (how many steps an Actor needs to take to get there) between 2 locations, assuming there is no obstacles in between.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default int distanceBetween​(Location l1, Location l2)
    Computes the layer distance between 2 locations.

  • Method Details

    • distanceBetween

      default int distanceBetween​(Location l1, Location l2)
      Computes the layer distance between 2 locations.
      Parameters:
      l1 - Location 1
      l2 - Location 2
      Returns:
      The layer distance between l1 & l2
